name: fire
description: Welcome to the Fire Arena, a place of intense heat and fierce battles. Win here and be rewarded by Emma Laurent.

name: ice
description: Enter the Ice Arena, where the cold chills to the bone and only the strongest survive. Triumph here and be honored by Cha Hae-In and Alicia Blanche.

name: exotic
description: Step into the Exotic Arena, a realm of mystery and unparalleled challenges. Victory here brings recognition from Choi Jong-In.
